sniper-jinja
============

|travis-status|

sniper-jinja is a `jinja2 <http://jinja.pocoo.org/>`_ plugin for `sniper <http://py-sniper.readthedocs.io/en/master/>`_.

.. |travis-status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/lexdene/sniper-jinja.svg?branch=master
    :alt: travis status
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/lexdene/sniper-jinja
